column4: since updating to 11.04, i haven't been able to start firefox without it using 100% of a core and never starting. I decided to use the -jsconsole option with firefox, and it turns out that I'm missing a chrome.manifest file
have you tried moving the  hidden firefox folder to a new name, so it starts up from scratch?
yes, it would be in your users folder
if something doesn't work after an upgrade, thats always a good place to start
